text: James R. Langevin (born April 22, 1964) is an American politician from Rhode Island. He had represented Rhode Island's 2nd congressional district from 2001 to 2023. He is a part of the Democratic Party. He was also the Secretary of State of Rhode Island between 1995 and 2001. Langevin is the first quadriplegic to be a part of the United States Congress. He was paralyzed after an accidental shooting. In January 2022, Langevin announced he would not run for re-election in that year's election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Rhode Island Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Politicians from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James Langevin
